connect20/wishpond_social_campaigns.name: connect20/Wishpond_Social_Campaigns

suggest.magento-hackathon/magento-composer-insta: Allows to manage this package as a dependency

connect20/wishpond_social_campaigns.description: Easily gather new Customer Intelligence - and new customers - by running Sweepstakes and Offers on your Magento Store and Facebook Page. Free 30-day trial.
